Mostly clear PERIOD Low near 35F PERIOD Winds light and variable PERIOD

Updated November     pm



The Universitys interim provost to serve June  through June  was announced Tuesday morning PERIOD

Laurel Weldon professor of political science will assume responsibility from Tim Sands executive vice president for academic affairs and provost PERIOD Sands will become president of Virginia Tech University on June  PERIOD

On July  Debasish Deba Dutta associate provost and dean of Graduate College at the University of Illinois at UrbanaChampaign will become Purdues next provost PERIOD

Until Dutta assumes office Weldon will be responsible for all of Purdues colleges schools and related academic activities in coordination with the Office of the President PERIOD The provost also oversees libraries cultural centers and enrollment management including admissions registrar and financial aid PERIOD Various student success programs and the appointment and retention of faculty of academic staff will also be Weldons responsibility PERIOD
